name: Unzip and Unrar Bot
description: Telegram bot to unzip and Unrar files.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Get your id by sending /id to @szrosebot. Fill only if you filled OWNER_NAME.

OWNER_NAME.description: Your name (to show as owner).Fill only if you filled OWNER_ID.
